com.relteq.sirius.simulator
Class _Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.relteq.sirius.simulator._Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceComponent, InterfaceController
public abstract class _Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceComponent, InterfaceController

Simple implementation of InterfaceController.

This is the base class for all controllers contained in a scenario. It provides a full default implementation of InterfaceController so that extended classes need only implement a portion of the interface.

Method Detail

registerFlowController

protected boolean registerFlowController(_Link link,
                                         int index)
Use this method within InterfaceController.register() to register flow control with a target link. The return value is true if the registration is successful, and false otherwise.

Parameters:
link - The target link for flow control.
index - The index of the link in the controller's list of targets.
Returns:
A boolean indicating success of the registration.

registerSpeedController

protected boolean registerSpeedController(_Link link,
                                          int index)
Use this method within InterfaceController.register() to register speed control with a target link. The return value is true if the registration is successful, and false otherwise.

Parameters:
link - The target link for speed control.
index - The index of the link in the controller's list of targets.
Returns:
A boolean indicating success of the registration.
